# isSetOnMouseExited

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver becomes current when it receives a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/mouseExited(with:)] message.

## Declaration

```swift
var isSetOnMouseExited: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver becomes current when it receives a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/mouseExited(with:)] message; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Deprecated

- **init(image:foregroundColorHint:backgroundColorHint:hotSpot:)**: Initializes the cursor with the specified image and hot spot.
- **mouseEntered(with:)**: Automatically sent to the receiver when the cursor enters a cursor rectangle owned by the receiver.
- **setOnMouseEntered(_:)**: Specifies whether the receiver accepts [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/mouseEntered(with:)] events.
- **isSetOnMouseEntered**: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver becomes current on receiving a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/mouseEntered(with:)] message.
- **mouseExited(with:)**: Automatically sent to the receiver when the cursor exits a cursor rectangle owned by the receiver.
- **setOnMouseExited(_:)**: Sets whether the receiver accepts [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCursor/mouseExited(with:)] events.
